Manifiesto.title: Manifesto
Manifiesto.subtitle: What is coming waits for no one.
Manifiesto.section1_text: We live in the vortex. A turning point where old structures dissolve before new ones have finished forming. It is not a crisis, it is a metamorphosis.
Manifiesto.section2_text: For the first time in history, we face the real possibility of our own productive irrelevance. What are we when we are no longer useful? This is the fundamental question of our time.
Manifiesto.section3_text: Vōrtika is not a shelter, it is a map. An attempt to map the unknown territory opening up before us. We do not offer easy answers, but the right questions.
